title: ROUTT 45 AND ROUTT RSL ON GCN’S THE KING ALFRED’S WAY GRAVEL EPIC
content:
What to do when you are limited on your travel, must stay close to home AND you have two dialed gravel machines at your disposal? Well, in this case GCN (Global Cycling Network) took the new ROUTT RSL and ROUTT 45 on a Royal Gravel Epic right out their front door.  A simple two day, one night out on the bikes to feel the freedom of bike packing.  Sleeping where ever you end up and unplugging from the constant challenge that is a 2020.  Grab a pint, make some coffee and snuggle up with a couple of nice videos that the crew put out late this Fall.  We hope you enjoy!

 

Check out more on the ROUTT RSL and ROUTT 45 here:  ROUTT GRAVEL FAMILY GETS WIDE

 

The post ROUTT 45 AND ROUTT RSL ON GCN’S THE KING ALFRED’S WAY GRAVEL EPIC appeared first on Moots.
author: Jon Cariveau
